title: Welcome & Thank You
content: June2018 (SW26, HW1) 2/Jun ~ Thank you Boss Francis to top-up with the album by Rockwell with the hidden gem track "Knife". (SW1) 2/Jun ~ Thank you Handsome Say Wai to grab the sexy single Material Girl by Madonna. (SW1) 2/Jun ~ Thank you Boss Phua to top-up your order with PSB Heart/Remix single. (SW1) 2/Jun ~ Welcome back Boss Roger to grab more audiophile grade LP & CDs by Willie Nelson, Best of 五轮真弓, GM (Older), Cranberries & the LOT of 7 super rare CDs by Dick Lee. Great investment you have just made. (SW13) 1/Jun ~ Long time no hear Boss Vincent, nice to hear from you to chope the Manhattan Jazz audiophile grade jazz album and the Sonny Rollins Jazzstars albums. (SW2) 1/Jun ~ Thank you Teacher Ching Jen to chope the 4 tiers modular racks. (HW1) 1/Jun ~ Thank you Paul to add-on with more awesome 80s goodies. Truly a good investment for George Michael cum WHAM, Julie Sue & Kitaro. Thanks. (SW7, HW) "Welcome and Thank You" is the section to record down all the transactions within the month. Past monthly transactions are archived in the following URL: Archival of Welcome & Thank You
contentWithMarkup:
June2018 (SW26, HW1)

2/Jun ~ Thank you Boss Francis to top-up with the album by Rockwell with the hidden gem track "Knife". (SW1)

2/Jun ~ Thank you Handsome Say Wai to grab the sexy single Material Girl by Madonna. (SW1)

2/Jun ~ Thank you Boss Phua to top-up your order with PSB Heart/Remix single. (SW1)

2/Jun ~ Welcome back Boss Roger to grab more audiophile grade LP & CDs by Willie Nelson, Best of 五轮真弓, GM (Older), Cranberries & the LOT of 7 super rare CDs by Dick Lee. Great investment you have just made. (SW13)

1/Jun ~ Long time no hear Boss Vincent, nice to hear from you to chope the Manhattan Jazz audiophile grade jazz album and the Sonny Rollins Jazzstars albums. (SW2)

1/Jun ~ Thank you Teacher Ching Jen to chope the 4 tiers modular racks. (HW1)

1/Jun ~ Thank you Paul to add-on with more awesome 80s goodies. Truly a good investment for George Michael cum WHAM, Julie Sue & Kitaro. Thanks. (SW7, HW)

"Welcome and Thank You" is the section to record down all the transactions within the month. Past monthly transactions are archived in the following URL: Archival of Welcome & Thank You
